description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'notifications' for managing notification-related state within a React application's store. It includes the state interface, initial state, reducers for clearing errors and setting unread counts, and exports actions and reducer.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Resets the error field in the notification state to null.

methods.name: setUnreadCount
methods.description: Sets the unread notification count to the value provided in the action payload.
